body_html: @mingfeima we're more interested in using tbb for intra-op and inter-op parallelism (intra-op parallelism done with tbb + single thread MKL) compared with using MKL for intra-op and Caffe2 thread pool for inter-op. Mike, Alexey, and Alexei in TBB team have been providing great help to us. I haven't been able to make progress in the last few weeks but should be able to look at this again this week.

body: @mingfeima we're more interested in using tbb for intra-op and inter-op parallelism (intra-op parallelism done with tbb + single thread MKL) compared with using MKL for intra-op and Caffe2 thread pool for inter-op. Mike, Alexey, and Alexei in TBB team have been providing great help to us. I haven't been able to make progress in the last few weeks but should be able to look at this again this week.
